skillDetails.name: Skirmish
skillDetails.description: Aura: When allied Beasts or Reptiles spend a turn without attacking, apply Bleed on enemies equal to 5% of their current Health. (2% vs. Champions, Infinity Arena)

monstersWithSkill.skillDescription: Aura: When allied Beasts or Reptiles spend a turn without attacking, apply Bleed on enemies equal to 5% of their current Health. (2% vs. Champions, Infinity Arena)
